participant_1.background:
My job is secure and I get paid well.
i have two kids.
I like to create my own clothes because it allows me to express myself and be unique.
my favorite tv show is rick and morty.
i collect dolls.

participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I am doing well, thank you! What about you?
I am doing well too! I just got back from a trip to the beach.
Oh, that sounds nice! I love the beach. Where did you go?
I went to the beach in Bali. It was absolutely beautiful!
Wow, that sounds amazing! I have always wanted to go to Bali.
It was definitely worth the trip! I would highly recommend it.
I will definitely have to go there someday!
What do you do for fun?
I love to run and drink chai tea. I also enjoy making music and expressing myself through it.
That sounds really cool! I love to create my own clothes. It allows me to express myself and be unique.
That is awesome! I love that you are so creative.
Thank you! I love to hear about people's hobbies. What else do you like to do?
I have been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art. I also love visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.
That is all really cool! I have never tried rock collecting or macaroni art, but they sound like fun hobbies. I love the beach too! It is so relaxing.
It is! I love the sound of the waves and the smell of the salt air.
Me too! It is the best!
I am glad you enjoyed your trip to Bali! It sounds like it was amazing!
It was! I would highly recommend it to anyone
